supplements.title: Association between Gushen Antai recipe intervention and plasma cytokines during early pregnancy following IVF-ET: a cohort study.
supplements.summary: Herbal medicine Gushen Antai recipe may improve early pregnancy success after IVF by positively influencing plasma cytokine levels.

supplements.title: Coriandrum sativum improves prognosis in clear cell renal cell carcinoma by targeting NEK6 to modulate the immune microenvironment: a predictive study based on network pharmacology and multi-omics analysis.
supplements.summary: Coriander compounds may improve clear cell renal cell carcinoma prognosis by targeting NEK6 and enhancing immune cell interactions in the tumor microenvironment.

supplements.title: Mangiferin in human disease: Multifaceted mechanisms and applications (Review).
supplements.summary: Mangiferin, a natural compound, shows promise in suppressing cancer cell growth and inflammation by modulating key cellular signaling pathways.

supplements.title: Natural compound 5,7,8‑trimethoxyflavone mitigates radiation‑induced lung injury by suppressing EMT and PI3K/Akt pathway.
supplements.summary: A natural flavonoid compound can reduce lung damage from radiation therapy by blocking key cellular signaling pathways and preventing tissue transformation.

supplements.title: Reactivating necroptosis in colorectal cancer potentiates chemotherapy and antitumor immune responses.
supplements.summary: In colorectal cancer, the compound OSW-1 combined with 5-FU effectively kills cancer cells and boosts immune response by triggering cell death through multiple pathways.

supplements.title: Protective effect of Rosmarinus officinalis and its nanoparticles against chemobrain and neuroinflammation in rats: involvement of Wnt/β-catenin signaling and apoptotic machineries.
supplements.summary: Rosemary extract and its nanoparticles protected rat brain function and reduced neuroinflammation caused by oxaliplatin chemotherapy without interfering with cancer treatment.

supplements.title: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene suppresses prostate cancer via apoptosis and autophagy in vitro and potent tumor growth inhibition in vivo.
supplements.summary: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene effectively suppresses prostate cancer growth by inducing cell death through apoptosis and autophagy mechanisms.

supplements.title: Lactobacillus fermentum remodeled the lung microbiota by crosstalk with the gut and lungs and regulated the PI3K-AKT pathway to alleviate acute lung injury.
supplements.summary: Lactobacillus fermentum reduced lung inflammation by rebalancing gut and lung microbiota and suppressing a key cellular pathway in acute lung injury.

supplements.title: Ultrasound-assisted extraction of endemic Stachys antalyensis: LC-ESI-MS/MS phenolic profiling and in vitro antioxidant, enzyme-inhibitory, and cytotoxicity evaluation.
supplements.summary: Stachys antalyensis methanolic extract shows antioxidant and enzyme-inhibiting properties with low toxicity on lung cancer cells, demonstrating potential therapeutic value.

supplements.title: Comprehensive pharmacological insights into Glaucocalyxin A: Mechanisms and therapeutic potential.
supplements.summary: Glaucocalyxin A shows promising anti-tumor potential by targeting key cancer cell pathways, potentially regulating PI3K/Akt and p53 signaling.

supplements.title: Kaempferol suppresses prostate cancer metastasis and tumor angiogenesis via disrupting the LIMK1/Cofilin pathway.
supplements.summary: Kaempferol, a plant compound, suppresses prostate cancer growth and spread by disrupting a key cellular pathway that controls tumor blood vessel formation and cell division.

supplements.title: Celastrol induces cardiotoxicity by directly targeting AMOTL2 and inhibiting YAP1/PGC-1α/TFAM-dependent mitochondrial biogenesis.
supplements.summary: Celastrol causes heart damage by blocking a key protein (AMOTL2), which disrupts mitochondrial function and promotes cell death in heart tissue.

supplements.title: Structure-activity relationships reveal a 4-(2-pyridyl)chalcone as a potent cell death inducer.
supplements.summary: A specific chalcone (BHP) potently induced leukemia cell death by triggering mitochondrial apoptosis through caspase activation and oxidative stress.

supplements.title: Pachymic acid suppresses proliferation and invasion in colon cancer by inhibiting glycolysis via PPARγ/ENO1 pathway.
supplements.summary: Pachymic acid inhibits colon cancer cell growth and spread by disrupting sugar metabolism through a specific cellular pathway involving PPARγ.

supplements.title: Casticin in cancer research: in vitro evidence and mechanistic insights into its antitumor potential.
supplements.summary: Casticin, a natural compound, inhibits cancer cell growth by targeting multiple cellular pathways and inducing various forms of programmed cell death.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: In patients with major affective disorders, combining aspirin and atorvastatin showed potential to enhance antidepressant treatment by addressing underlying inflammatory processes.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary:
Here's a concise summary:

Aspirin and atorvastatin may help reduce inflammation and improve symptoms in patients with major affective disorders.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary:
Here's a clear, concise summary sentence:

Aspirin and atorvastatin combined may improve depression symptoms in patients with inflammatory markers by reducing inflammation.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: The study found that combining aspirin and atorvastatin may improve treatment outcomes for patients with major affective disorders by reducing inflammation.

off_label.title: The inhibition of Il1β synthesis mediated by a novel pyridine-sulfonamide compound protects against the progression of metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease.
off_label.summary: A novel compound AIK3a305 inhibits inflammatory protein IL1β, protecting liver cells and reducing progression of metabolic fatty liver disease in preclinical models.

off_label.title: GLP-1RAs versus metformin and Parkinson's risk in type 2 diabetes.
off_label.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

GLP-1 receptor agonists showed potential neuroprotective benefits compared to metformin in reducing Parkinson's disease risk among type 2 diabetes patients.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: Aspirin and atorvastatin may improve treatment outcomes for patients with major depressive disorder by reducing inflammation.

off_label.title: GLP-1RAs versus metformin and Parkinson's risk in type 2 diabetes.
off_label.summary: In patients with type 2 diabetes, GLP-1 receptor agonists showed potential neuroprotective effects against Parkinson's disease compared to metformin, warranting further research.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: Aspirin and atorvastatin combined showed potential to improve treatment outcomes for patients with major affective disorders experiencing inflammatory dysregulation.

off_label.title: Targeting UCHL3 attenuates pathological markers in neuronal models of Huntington's disease.
off_label.summary: By reducing UCHL3 in Huntington's disease neuronal models, researchers decreased mutant protein aggregates and improved cellular stress resistance.

off_label.title: Metformin treatment and reduction of gastrointestinal cancer risk: A 2-sample Mendelian randomization study.
off_label.summary: Metformin shows potential to reduce risk of esophageal, gastric, and colorectal cancers, with growth differentiation factor 15 possibly playing a key role in colorectal cancer prevention.

off_label.title: Metformin treatment and reduction of gastrointestinal cancer risk: A 2-sample Mendelian randomization study.
off_label.summary: Metformin shows potential to reduce risk of esophageal, gastric, and colorectal cancers, with growth differentiation factor 15 (GDF15) potentially mediating the protective effect on colorectal cancer.

off_label.title: The Potential Impact of Histamine-2 Receptor Antagonists on Gynecologic Cancer Risk: A Population-Based Study of 23 Million Individuals.
off_label.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

A large population study suggests histamine-2 receptor blockers may potentially reduce risk of gynecologic cancers like cervical, endometrial, and ovarian cancer.

off_label.title: Phenothiazine alleviates cisplatin-mediated acute kidney injury by inhibiting ferroptosis.
off_label.summary: Phenothiazine reduced kidney damage caused by cisplatin chemotherapy by blocking a type of cell death called ferroptosis in mouse models.

off_label.title: The Potential Impact of Histamine-2 Receptor Antagonists on Gynecologic Cancer Risk: A Population-Based Study of 23 Million Individuals.
off_label.summary: A population-based study suggests histamine-2 receptor antagonists might reduce the risk of gynecologic cancers by potentially offering protective or preventive effects.

biomarkers.title: A tri-scale in silico framework integrating pharmacovigilance and mechanistic modeling suggests tepotinib-associated acute kidney injury risk.
biomarkers.summary: A computational analysis of tepotinib for non-small cell lung cancer reveals potential acute kidney injury risk through multi-scale pharmacological investigation.

biomarkers.title: Toward next-generation therapeutic HPV vaccines: A review on expanding the antigen repertoire and an integrated bioinformatics selection framework.
biomarkers.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

A comprehensive review proposes expanding HPV vaccine antigens beyond traditional targets to improve therapeutic effectiveness against HPV-associated cancers.

biomarkers.title: Development and validation of a predictive model for high-risk immune-related adverse events in gastric cancer patients treated with ICIs.
biomarkers.summary: A predictive model using blood markers and tumor characteristics can effectively identify high-risk immune-related adverse events in gastric cancer patients treated with immunotherapy.

biomarkers.title: Engineering nanobodies for drug delivery systems in Alzheimer's disease.
biomarkers.summary:
This is not a cancer research paper, but a research paper about Alzheimer's disease (AD) focusing on nanobody drug delivery strategies to cross the blood-brain barrier and target disease mechanisms.

Here's a clear 25-word summary:

Researchers engineer nanobodies to penetrate the brain barrier, potentially targeting Alzheimer's disease mechanisms and developing novel therapeutic approaches to reduce neurodegeneration.

biomarkers.title: Discovery of novel and highly potent XIAP-targeted peptide inhibitors using virtual screening.
biomarkers.summary: Researchers discovered a novel peptide that can effectively block a protein in lung cancer cells, potentially stopping tumor growth with minimal damage to healthy cells.

biomarkers.title: Clinical characteristics and whole exome sequencing in JAK2V617F- and CALR-unmutated essential thrombocythemia.
biomarkers.summary:
I apologize, but I cannot provide a concise summary sentence from this abstract without seeing the full research findings or results section. biomarkers.title: Elevated C-reactive protein to albumin ratio is a promising predictive biomarker for prognosis in patients with renal cell carcinoma.
biomarkers.summary: A higher C-reactive protein to albumin ratio could help predict survival and outcomes for patients with kidney cancer.

biomarkers.title: Environmental tobacco smoke exposure and pelvic inflammatory disease: a cross-sectional analysis of serum cotinine.
biomarkers.summary: Non-smoking women with higher serum cotinine levels showed increased risk of pelvic inflammatory disease, suggesting environmental tobacco smoke exposure may impact reproductive health.

biomarkers.title: Machine learning-assisted detection of canine mammary tumors using serum autoantibody signatures.
biomarkers.summary: A machine learning model using blood autoantibody signatures can accurately detect canine mammary tumors, offering a promising noninvasive diagnostic approach.

biomarkers.title: The P7 peptide antagonizes bFGF-induced malignant behaviors of ovarian cancer by inhibiting MEK/ERK signaling pathway.
biomarkers.summary: P7 peptide reduces ovarian cancer cell growth and spread by blocking a key signaling pathway triggered by basic fibroblast growth factor.

biomarkers.title: Exogenous indole promotes florfenicol tolerance in Edwardsiella tarda.
biomarkers.summary: Exogenous indole promotes florfenicol tolerance in Edwardsiella tarda by disrupting bacterial metabolism and reducing antibiotic effectiveness in fish pathogens.

biomarkers.title: Secondary causes and renal outcomes in apparently resistant hypertension: a retrospective cohort study.
biomarkers.summary: Patients with primary aldosteronism showed different kidney function decline compared to those with true resistant hypertension in a retrospective study.

biomarkers.title: Collaborative breakthroughs in precision diagnosis and treatment of nasopharyngeal cancer: Biomarker‑driven screening and endoscopic minimally invasive surgery reshape the new paradigm of early intervention (Review).
biomarkers.summary: New screening techniques using Epstein-Barr virus biomarkers can now predict nasopharyngeal cancer risk with 97.9% accuracy, enabling early detection and precision treatment.

biomarkers.title: GPR176 enhances the epithelial‑mesenchymal transition in gastric cancer cells by activating the PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway.
biomarkers.summary: GPR176 promotes gastric cancer cell migration and invasion by activating key signaling pathways, potentially serving as a new prognostic marker.

biomarkers.title: HMBOX1 inhibits hepatocellular carcinoma progression via PTPN1 mediated AKT1 phosphorylation.
biomarkers.summary: In liver cancer, HMBOX1 protein appears to slow tumor growth by influencing cell signaling pathways, potentially offering a new approach to treatment.

trials.title: Peptide-drug conjugates in tumor therapy: Current advances and future perspectives.
trials.summary: Peptide-drug conjugates show promise in cancer therapy by precisely targeting tumors, enhancing drug delivery, and reducing systemic toxicity.

trials.title: Long-term follow-up of zevor-cel in patients with relapsed/refractory multiple myeloma.
trials.summary: A single CAR T-cell therapy infusion showed 100% response rate and promising long-term survival in heavily pretreated multiple myeloma patients.

trials.title: Late failure of aggressive B-cell lymphoma after CAR T-cell therapy: a LYSA study from the DESCAR-T registry.
trials.summary: In late-stage large B-cell lymphoma, bispecific antibodies showed better progression-free survival compared to other treatments after CAR T-cell therapy failure.

trials.title: Cabozantinib and thromboembolism in patients with cancer: a systematic review, meta-analysis, and retrospective study.
trials.summary: Cabozantinib significantly increases venous thromboembolism risk in cancer patients, especially during the first three months of treatment.

trials.title: Bio-reductive hetero-bimetallic Co(iii)-Pt(ii) complex for tumor-selective platinum release and cytotoxicity.
trials.summary: A novel Co(iii)-Pt(ii) complex selectively targets lung and breast cancer cells by releasing platinum under tumor-specific reductive conditions.

trials.title: [Evaluation of long-term prognosis of gastric cancer patients by tumor textbook outcome and analysis of related factors].
trials.summary: In gastric cancer patients, achieving textbook oncologic outcome is associated with significantly better long-term survival, particularly for younger patients with early-stage disease.

trials.title: Risk of bone fractures in patients with prostate cancer treated with maximal androgen blockade therapy: a systematic literature review and meta-analysis.
trials.summary: Prostate cancer patients receiving maximal androgen blockade therapy have a significantly increased risk of bone fractures compared to those on standard androgen deprivation therapy.

trials.title: The 'Comparison of diagnostic accuracy of Luminal Index and standard of care MRI for Accelerated deTEction of prostate cancer' (CLIMATE) trial protocol.
trials.summary:
Here's a clear, concise summary sentence:

This clinical trial protocol will evaluate a new, faster MRI technique (Luminal Index) for more accurately detecting clinically significant prostate cancer.

trials.title: Safety and effectiveness of selpercatinib in patients with RET fusion-positive non-small cell lung cancer in real-world clinical practice: a postmarketing study in Japan.
trials.summary: Selpercatinib showed promising safety and effectiveness for treating RET fusion-positive non-small cell lung cancer in real-world Japanese clinical settings.

trials.title: Impact of Early-Line Systemic Therapies on Liver Function in Hepatocellular Carcinoma: Longitudinal Change of ALBI Score and Ammonia Level With and Without Anti-VEGF Agents.
trials.summary: Anti-VEGF therapy for hepatocellular carcinoma may compromise liver function by potentially inhibiting liver regeneration and impacting albumin-bilirubin scores.

trials.title: [Preliminary application of linear stapler-assisted en bloc resection of lateral pelvic sidewall for locally advanced rectal cancer and locally recurrent rectal cancer with significant pelvic occupation].
trials.summary: A surgical technique using linear staplers enables precise, less invasive removal of laterally invasive rectal cancer tumors while minimizing blood loss and complications.

trials.title: Real-world utilization and potential clinical and economic value of recombinant zoster vaccine and select preventive services recommended for older adults in the United States.
trials.summary: A study evaluated the uptake and potential benefits of shingles vaccine and other preventive health services for Americans over 50, aiming to improve vaccination and screening rates.

trials.title: Evolution and trends in non-viral mRNA Cancer vaccines: A scoping review from 2015 to 2025.
trials.summary: mRNA cancer vaccines are shifting from dendritic cell-based to lipid nanoparticle delivery systems, with increasing use in combination immunotherapies across various cancer types.

trials.title: A phase I/IIa study of auceliciclib in patients with advanced solid tumours and in combination with temozolomide in patients with recurrent/relapsed high-grade glioma.
trials.summary: Auceliciclib, a new drug targeting specific cell cycle enzymes, shows promise for treating advanced solid tumors and recurrent high-grade brain cancer.

trials.title: Perioperative chemoimmunotherapy for patients with gastric or gastroesophageal junction cancer: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
trials.summary: The meta-analysis suggests that adding immune checkpoint inhibitors to perioperative treatment may improve outcomes for patients with gastric and gastroesophageal junction cancer.
